challenges_overcome: None

technical_learnings: Orchestrator uses branch name to identify active issue ID for progress logs.
Progress logs for Orchestrator should be in ~/.agent/progress-logs/ named task-<id>.md.
Planning documents (ROADMAP.md, ImplementationPlan.md) are expected in .agent/rules/.
challenges_overcome: Orchestrator initialization failures due to missing mandatory planning docs in specific locations.
Identifying the correct naming convention for task branches and logs.
protocol_issues: Initial confusion about the location of progress logs (repo vs home dir).
Initialization check is strict about the existence of specific files even for simple tasks.
process_improvements: Centralizing planning docs in .agent/rules/ to satisfy Orchestrator across all projects.
Automating the creation of mandatory planning boilerplates for simple tasks.

technical_learnings: Browser automation must explicitly select 'Squash and merge' option on GitHub
GitHub's default merge strategy creates merge commits, not atomic commits
Orchestrator finalization checks did not detect merge commit violations
challenges_overcome: Identified SOP violation through user feedback after merge completion
protocol_issues: PR #2 merged with merge commit (d228b74) instead of rebase-squash strategy
Violated SOP_COMPLIANCE_CHECKLIST.md line 84: 'Squash feature branch into single atomic commit'
Violated git-workflow.md line 10: 'All PRs must use Rebase and Squash strategy'
8 individual commits preserved in main branch instead of 1 atomic commit
process_improvements: Created Beads issue agent-harness-v0o: Enforce Rebase-Squash Strategy
Adding test suite with 5 test cases following agent-harness-a5r pattern
Updating PR template with pre-merge rebase-squash checklist
Enhancing browser automation to select correct merge strategy

handoff_quality.successor_readiness: High - comprehensive plan and test suite defined

technical_learnings: Used case-insensitive matching for stem-based test discovery to resolve mapping issues.
Centralized modern terminology definitions in NOMENCLATURE.md to ensure consistency across the system.
Implemented validate_tdd_compliance directly in Orchestrator for immediate enforcement during Execution phase.
challenges_overcome: Resolved 'EOF when reading a line' issues by providing a structured JSON fallback for reflection capture.
Fixed pathlib mocking issues in Plan Approval tests by using MagicMock(spec=Path).
Modernized 15+ legacy files with aviation metaphors without breaking links.
protocol_issues: Found redundant NOMENCLATURE.md files in different locations; consolidated to docs/sop/NOMENCLATURE.md.
Detected broken link to GEMINI.md in rules/README.md; corrected to SOP.md.
process_improvements: Automated SOP gate test stub generation via generate_test_template.py.
Added status report functionality to check_test_coverage.py for real-time compliance tracking.
Integrated TDD enforcement into the initialization phase for pre-emptive violation detection.

technical_learnings: Implemented check_linked_repositories which auto-detects changes in global dirs by scanning git status.
Fixed a critical infinite hang bug in the Orchestrator by adding timeouts to all subprocess.run calls.
Learned to manage dot-agent and dot-gemini as first-class git repositories with PR workflows.

Managing git state across three distinct repositories simultaneously.
Correcting terminology in global skills during active execution.

Added mandatory Linked Repository validation to the Finalization phase.

technical_learnings: Atomic commit enforcement requires checking both commit count and presence of merge commits.
Conventional commit messages should be consistent across all linked repositories.
Orchestrator validation can effectively block non-compliant PRs before they land.
challenges_overcome: Identified and squashed local multiple commits before finalization to maintain atomic history.
Integrated cross-repo validation logic to ensure all linked repos are compliant.
protocol_issues: Initial internal commits did not follow the required squash strategy, which was caught by the new validation logic.
process_improvements: Updated finalization.sh to include Beads issue ID and conventional format in auto-commits.
Created browser automation template for 'Squash and merge' selection.

technical_learnings: Used 'bd comments add' for standardized closure notes as 'bd close' does not take a comment parameter.
Integrated productivity aliases (bd-note) into Beads Field Manual to align with agent intuition.
Cross-repo compliance validation in Orchestrator ensures all linked repositories follow the PR workflow.
challenges_overcome: Resolved URL formatting mismatch in replace_file_content by exactly matching the markdown source.
Fixed multiple local commits to maintain atomic history required by Finalization check.
Resolved protected branch issues in linked repos by creating feature branches and PRs.
protocol_issues: Cognitive load in remembering correct Beads commands for closure notes; solved by documentation and aliases.
Finalization check blocks when linked repositories have uncommitted changes or are on main branch.
process_improvements: Recommended 'bd-note' alias in Beads Field Manual.
Standardized closure note instructions in SOP checklist and Finalization documents.
